statements.name: PROC DSTODS2
statements.description: Translates DATA step code into DS2 code.

arguments.name: IN=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the DATA step file or a SAS fileref.

arguments.name: OUT=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the DS2 file that is created.

arguments.name: OUTDIR=
arguments.description: specifies the output directory name for the file.
